data.eml:eml: Two new species of Tornidae (Caenogastropoda, Rissooidea) from Espirito Santo, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Simone, Luiz Ricardo L. (2012): Two new species of Tornidae (Caenogastropoda, Rissooidea) from Espirito Santo, Brazil. ZooKeys 238: 77-85, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.238.3884, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.238.3884
